name: Verify that the error message is shown when user enters email in the wrong format

children.description: Given I am on the Home page and click the User icon
When I click the Sign up link
And I enter "jenny33@" in the wrong format
And I click on the Sign up button
Then The error message "Email không đúng định dạng" is shown next to the email label

userStory.narrative: I want to verify the Sign up form

title: Verify that the error message is shown when user enters email in the wrong format

dataTable.scenarioOutline:
Given I am on the Home page and click the User icon
When I click the Sign up link
And I enter "<Email>" in the wrong format
And I click on the Sign up button
Then The error message "Email không đúng định dạng" is shown next to the email label

scenarioOutline:
Given I am on the Home page and click the User icon
When I click the Sign up link
And I enter "<Email>" in the wrong format
And I click on the Sign up button
Then The error message "Email không đúng định dạng" is shown next to the email label
